title: Java QA Automation Developer
skills: Java, Javascript, Git, Maven, Jira, Confluence
description: Designed and developed a Java framework with a strong emphasis on quality and performance for testing a globally used trading platform. This framework utilizes Java and JavaScript to provide dual functionality for both the trading platform and its associated website. Collaboration with cross-functional teams worldwide was essential to develop solutions, integrate new features into the development cycle, and plan future initiatives.

title: Team Leader
description: I utilized my leadership skills by effectively managing a team and ensuring smooth operations. I fostered teamwork and open communication, enabling our team to deliver excellent customer service. My role also required strong time management to balance daily tasks and ensure that everything ran efficiently.
